I was the primary developer for a db-driven site for film students to organize their projects. This was in PHP + MySQL + CodeIgnitor. I worked on this through a successfull launch and subsequent maintenance while I was taking classes.

Projects

  • Vimbits.com
  • Github.com/kkuchta/vimbits
A Rails site for trading snippets of Vim configuration I did to scratch my own itch. Browse 'top', 'hot', 'new', and 'random' vimrc snippets. Has user account, tags, code highlighting.
  • Ubimenu.com
A hosted-menu service for restaurants I worked on with a friend. Also Rails, though I did mostly frontend work.
  • Kodak Collage
6-month senior project at RIT working with Kodak with a 5-person team. A Facebook app for creating collages from existing photos. C#, Rails, JS
